name: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
description: A collection of short stories featuring the legendary detective Sherlock Holmes.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.
author: Harper Lee

name: 1984 - George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother.
author: George Orwell

name: Pride and Prejudice
description: A romantic novel that also critiques the British landed gentry.
author: Jane Austen

name: The Great Gatsby
description: A novel about the American dream and the Roaring Twenties.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

name: Moby-Dick - Herman Melville
description: A novel about the voyage of the whaling ship Pequod.
author: Herman Melville

name: War and Peace - Leo Tolstoy
description: A novel that chronicles the history of the French invasion of Russia.
author: Leo Tolstoy

name: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A novel about the events in the life of a young boy named Holden Caulfield.
author: J.D. Salinger

name: The Hobbit - J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fantasy novel about the journey of Bilbo Baggins.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

name: The Lord of the Rings
description: A high-fantasy epic novel that follows the quest to destroy the One Ring.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
